javac disasm.java
java disasm teste.bin

// Para executar o teste copie e cole o comando acima no terminal


jns 100         0000 000100000000
load 200        0001 001000000000
store 300       0010 001100000000
add 400         0011 010000000000
subt 500        0100 010100000000
input           0101 000000000000
output          0110 000000000000
skipcond 800    1000 100000000000
jump 600        1001 011000000000
clear           1010 000000000000
addi 700        1011 011100000000
jumpi 0         1100 000000000000
loadi 900       1101 100100000000
storei 101      1110 000100000001
halt            0111 000000000000


















load 111    0001000100010001
store 112   0010000100010010
load 113    0001000100010011
subt 116    0100000100010110
store 115   0010000100010101
load 114    0001000100010100
addi 112    1011000100010010
store 114   0010000100010100

11 = 00010001 = 17
11 = 00010001 = 17
21 = 00100001 = 33
12 = 00010010 = 18
11 = 00010001 = 17 
13 = 00010011 = 19
41 = 01000001 = 65
16 = 00010110 = 22
21 = 00100001 = 33
15 = 00010101 = 21
11 = 00010001 = 17 
14 = 00010100 = 20
B1 = 10110001 = 177
12 = 00010010 = 18
21 = 00100001 = 33
14 = 00010100 = 20
